reviewText: I have watched this series since it debuted in 2008 and I enjoyed it, especially when the featured words are defined on the show.
Title: Martha Speaks: Martha Says It With Flowers

reviewText: It always has a positive message and the kids find it enjoyable.  Plus the message always has a good life lesson attached.
Title: Martha Speaks: Martha Says It With Flowers

reviewText: It is one of the only kids shows I can stand!  It's really fun and teaches vocabulary........some adults could use this.....maybe it should be on prime time!  We wish Martha was OUR dog.  Pass the alphabet soup!
Title: Martha Speaks: Martha Says It With Flowers

reviewText: so glad I have my one year old grand daughter  around to use as an excuse to watch it. Hey, someone has to check these things out,'it's for the kids!'
Title: Martha Speaks: Martha Says It With Flowers

reviewText: while there are other top favorite episodes I wish could of made this DVD it has a large number of ones I really enjoy. Based on the children book series this DVD helps little kids learn vocabulary words while older kids will find enjoyable strictly from an entertainment stand point.  Being the first DVD to be release of the series however I was surprise that the episode MARTHA SPEAKS where Martha starts talking for the first time wasn't included here.  What are including among the 8 fifteen minute episodes that include TD, Helen and Martha trying to get pass a dog hating janitor to switch art drawings, Martha trying to make up for her past mistakes by doing something nice for grandma on her birthday but have trouble finding the right gift. Martha delivers flowers from the flower shop to a haunted house and sends TD, Helen and Martha into the type of spooky hi jinx you'd expect from the Hardy Boys. Martha learns about being a racist in a family friendly manner when Alice and Helen is making a fuss over a kitten.  When Truman says he never eat ice cream Alice goes above and beyond being annoying to try to make him eat it.  Helen and her family learn that while Alphabet soup makes Martha talks eating Helen's music home work makes her sing and she tries everything and ask everyone to try to find someone to stop her singing.  TD and his school friends form a neighborhood band. unfortunately they only know one song. About Belgium.
summary: Martha Speaks Martha says it with Flowers
Title: Martha Speaks: Martha Says It With Flowers

reviewText: Martha Speaks is a hilarious show and it also teaches my son a lot of words.  I haven't seen anything that I object to.  It's great.
Title: Martha Speaks: Martha Says It With Flowers

reviewText: This show is educational and funny. We love this show. Great for kids and adults.  Wonderful creative minds at work.
Title: Martha Speaks: Martha Says It With Flowers

reviewText: Fun for children and  parents. Plenty of words provided with definitions that children will use in their everyday speech. Repetition ensures retention.
Title: Martha Speaks: Martha Says It With Flowers

reviewText: Very entertaining and educational. The stories are fun and the children are exposed to several interesting words during each episode.
Title: Martha Speaks: Martha Says It With Flowers

reviewText: My six-year-old daughter loves reading, and loves learning new vocabulary. It was not too long ago that she and I discovered the PBS Kids' program, "Martha Speaks". The show is about a dog named Martha who gains the gift of speaking after she eats some alphabet soup. She has plenty of adventures with her best buddy Skits (another dog) and several other neighborhood animals and people. There are eight episodes on this DVD, i.e. Raiders of the Lost Art, Says It With Flowers, Martha Gets Spooked, Martha Changes Her Luck, There Goes the Neighborhood, Ice Scream, Martha Sings, and TD Makes the Band.Each episode, like all Martha episodes teaches children vocabulary, and most importantly, teach the use of these words in context. This show is a great teaching resource, and the stories are engaging. "Martha Speaks" has become one of my daughter's favorite children's shows!
summary: Fun, educational show that teaches vocabulary
Title: Martha Speaks: Martha Says It With Flowers
